roleset.name: to engage in or spread gossip

example.name: intransitive
example.text: [Farmers in loose turbans and fancy earrings]-1 spend their afternoons [*-1] laughing and gossiping at the markets .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'gossip' based on WSJ; nominal 'gossiping' based on BOLT-7.

example.name: nominal rel: gossiping
example.text: Is it that you want property prices to go up at your gossiping . Then you can successfully get rid of the properties you hold to avert risks ?
